body.raw:
{
    "namespace": "{{namespace}}",
    "user": "{{orderWithRecurringItemAndMetaUser}}", 
    "priceNet": "{{rowPriceNet}}",
    "priceVat": "{{rowPriceVat}}",
    "priceTotal": "{{rowPriceTotal}}",
    "items": [
        {
            "productId": "{{productFound}}",
            "quantity": {{qty}},
            "productName": "Product Name",
            "unit": "pcs",
            "rowPriceNet": "{{rowPriceNet}}",
            "rowPriceVat": "{{rowPriceVat}}",
            "rowPriceTotal": "{{rowPriceTotal}}",
            "startDate": "2021-10-19T10:00:00",
            "billingStartDate":"2021-11-19T10:00:00",
            "periodFrequency":"1",
            "periodUnit": "monthly",
            "periodCount": null,
            "vatPercentage": "24",
            "priceNet": "{{priceNet}}",
            "priceVat": "{{priceVat}}",
            "priceGross": "{{priceGross}}",
            "meta": [
                {
                    "key": "licensePlateNumber",
                    "value": "KYV-123",
                    "label": "Rekisterinumero",
                    "visibleInCheckout": false,
                    "ordinal": "1"
                },
                {
                    "key": "anotherMeta",
                    "value": "valueForMeta",
                    "label": "Visible in Checkout",
                    "visibleInCheckout": true,
                    "ordinal": "2"
                }
            ]
        }
    ],
    "customer": {
        "firstName": "{{testCustomerFirstName}}",
        "lastName": "{{testCustomerLastName}}",
        "email": "{{testCustomerEmail}}",
        "phone": "{{testCustomerPhone}}"
    }
}
